name: 英語III（Business English）中級　04組
professor: 福澤　善文
level: 中級レベル（発展・応用）
subtitle: Learning Basic Business in English
textbook:
Classes/Odd number: Materials are to be sent to each student at the registered e-mail address.

Classes/Even number: Harvard Business School（HBS）cases.
Each student is required to pay Yen which is equivalent to US＄4.25 for each case at the time of distribution for the copy permission to be paid to HBS.

If you miss class for any reason, it is your responsibility to ensure that you obtain any notes, assignments or handouts.

evaluation_method.name: 試験
evaluation_method.detail: Students are expected to score 50％ at minimum. As long as students attend classes and follow the instructor, they will score 50％ by all means.

evaluation_method.name: レポート
evaluation_method.detail: Quizzes and Reporting assignments: These are for examining students' understanding of lectures and readings.

evaluation_method.name: 平常点評価
evaluation_method.detail:
Preparation and Participation: Those who well prepare for the class and participate in the class discussion would be appreciated.
Attendance: Basically, students are expected to attend all classes and keep up with the weekly reading assignments.

textbook: There is no textbook for this class. Instead, there is an Internet website.

evaluation_method.name: その他
evaluation_method.detail:
Students receive 16 points for each comment they write with a minimum of 170 words or more. They also receive 14 points for each reply they write with a minimum of 150 words or more. POINTS – 30% of the final grade
SCORES – 70% of the final grade
